website_summaries.verdict: A very good beginner’s ski that offers stability and builds confidence in the water.
pros: A wide ski for beginner adults
Very stable, allowing users to pop right up into position without struggling
Bindings adjust to several foot sizes
cons: Bindings can be too loose for smaller feet

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Approved
customer_reviews.text: Quality was good, my daughter had NO PROBLEM skiing them, and she has only been on skis twice before. She popped right up and later said she really like them. She is 16.
customer_reviews.author: Derek J. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great Skis, Big Foot Slots
customer_reviews.text: Love the skis but wish the bindings were tighter. I have to have the foot slots as small as they go. Wish I were able to get them a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of skis
customer_reviews.text: Great set of skis for beginners to intermediate skill level. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: NuDad Chris

customer_reviews.title: Water Skis run big
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be ok skiis but my son wears a men's 81/2 -9 and these are too big for him.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Looks are too notch
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and ride well, no complaints at all with these skis
customer_reviews.author: Blake Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Got up the first time in 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The skis showed up today with a big scratch on the top of the one ski. I leave tomorrow for the lake and was really excited to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bery nice skiis. Great price and a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TKD TEACHER

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed since we already owe a pair and they work ...
customer_reviews.text: We would have sent them back but we had already used them at the lake. The bindings would not slide back-and-forth so when we got into the water we could not adjust them. Very disappointed since we already owe a pair and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great skis - more importantly they were well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Great skis - more importantly they were well packaged, arrived intact and were as advertised. Length and color I ordered is what arrived unlike the Hydroslides which I had to return twice
customer_reviews.author: Brendon C.

product_meta.title: O'Brien Reactor Combo Water Skis with 700 Bindings, 67"
product_meta.description: The O'Brien REACTOR combo water skis feature a wide forebody and tunnel channels for stability and performance. These 67 inch.
feature_bullets: 700 Adjustable Bindings (one ski has rear toe piece)
